channel.title: Request: Server Editing Guide -- Thanks
channel.description: Hey, I generally know how to start a server but I don't get how to edit it. I've seen the shops script and added shops, but ye you need an NPC or a command to run the shops? So how to do that? How to add scripts like gambling, vote more NPC's, etc., and where to put them once they're finished? I know a bit of Java Coding so not so much of a problem... Thanks guys, cya!

item.title: Request: Server Editing Guide -- Thanks
item.dc:creator: @Just_Lurkin Just Lurkin
item.description:
@Just_Lurkin wrote:

Hey, I generally know how to start a server but I don’t get how to edit it. I’ve seen the shops script and added shops, but ye you need an NPC or a command to run the shops? So how to do that? How to add scripts like gambling, vote more NPC’s, etc., and where to put them once they’re finished? I know a bit of Java Coding so not so much of a problem…
Thanks guys, cya!
